name: FoodComponentHelper
description: The `FoodComponentHelper` class provides access to food properties and behaviors for items that can be consumed by players. This helper class exposes information about hunger restoration, saturation, special eating conditions, and status effects that may be applied when consuming food items.

methods.name: getHunger
methods.description: Returns the amount of hunger points this food restores.

methods.name: getSaturation
methods.description: Returns the amount of saturation this food restores.

methods.name: isAlwaysEdible
methods.description: Determines if this food can be eaten even when the player is not hungry.

methods.name: isFastFood
methods.description: Determines if this food can be eaten faster than normal (eating time less than 1.6 seconds).

methods.name: getStatusEffects
methods.description: Returns a map of status effects that may be applied when consuming this food, along with their probabilities.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the food component with key properties.
